itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 27, 2013
byline: Queena Kim, Doug Tribou, Bruce Johnson, David Weinberg, Oleg Boldyrev and Lizzie O'Leary
teaser: Twitter's stock closed yesterday at a level that's almost triple its IPO price. Twitter's IPO was one of the biggest tech events of the year, and tt's been a very hot 12 months for tech all around. We look at what's on deck for tech in 2014. The 2013 NFL season wraps up this weekend with several teams still in the hunt for a playoff spot. Social media has become a big part of the game for athletes. But there are pitfalls. When a player's profile rises, so does the potential for miscues. But one rising NFL star is turning his social media habit into a business platform.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 27, 2013
